abfc952fd0ed88f6246b1d969a8a980ea63f0bd6.commitMessage:
Fix suspicious getters and setters. #1555

Fixes `SuspiciousGetterSetter` inspection violations.

Description:
>Reports suspicious getter or setter methods. A getter or setter is suspicious if it accesses a different field than would be expected by its name.

49eb0e934ee82cf33c6643a4a15eb74ad471a6a9.commitMessage:
Yet another refactor to have the ANT task support a nested <property>
element. This let me remove the ugly have I put in to support relative
paths. Got the idea from Vincet Massol. Bug 605141.

816c6b33c9ab7b1f3584e3f29ff410fccaa193ee.commitMessage: use accessor methods for superclass atributes, fixes bug #594466 (I hope)

b3133035a4fa0e086dfb0dfbefbc7f1540521bbc.commitMessage: 576165: better error handling for missing properties file.

2d315277b6e1c152fd78da9fb91f214c43b31996.commitMessage:
Fixed Checkstyle errors. Important to make sure that Checkstyle passes with no
errors, as I get asked if "Checkstyle Checkstyle's" all the time. :-)
